plot: Two people escape the island even as more victims pile up. A final standoff in the church leads to a fire and a killer's revelation. Abby is held captive and must fight to save herself; survivors are questioned by police.

Wakefield is unable to prevent the two Allens escaping by boat. Sully believes to be trapping Wakefield with Henry, but is murdered by father and son himself before he realizes they were in league from the start. When incredulous Abby is told the whole story, Wakefield wants to execute her, but is slain himself as henry chooses his first love over his re-found father. Abby openly refuses and is disgusted to find Henry is setting tied Jimy up as Wakefield's bastard-accomplice, only to have the tables turned a last time.—KGF Vissers
